article_title: Will Virginia Lawmakers Listen To Voters On Medicaid Expansion?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: A special legislative session has been called in Virginia this week to consider Medicaid expansion, and the question remains will Governor McAuliffe win this round or be rebuffed again? Here is a sneak preview.
og.title: Special Session Sneak Peek: Will Virginia Lawmakers Listen To Voters On Medicaid Expansion?
